sections.name: Couplet!Dernière fin Cm
lyrics: Money rains from the sky above
But keep the change, 'cause I've got enough
A little time and some tenderness
You'll never buy my love
No other thing that's as precious too
(No other, there's no other)
Than a heart that's real and a heart that's true
Something that you got to know this girl

sections.name: Instru
lyrics: Take my hand
Go ahead my love

sections.name: Couplet!Dernière fin Cm
lyrics: These presents don't really come for free
Your paychecks don't mean that much to me
Just take my hand and hold me tight
You'll never buy my love
You buy me this and you buy me that
(To win over, win me over)
You got me wrong and that's a fact
Something that you got to know this

sections.name: Pont
lyrics: Will you realise when I'm gone
That I dance to a different song?
Will you realise when I'm gone
That I dance to a different song?
It's a shame but I got to go

sections.name: Instru
lyrics: Take my hand
Go ahead my love
